Detailed Description

Provides a virtual superclass that defines a standard interface for a sonar-based occupancy grid map.

Usage

Subclass, providing definitions for all virtual members.

Dependencies

The utility structures of RmUtility::SonarReading and RmUtility::BoundBox are used in passing sonar data and specifying grid boundaries, respectively.
